Flickr papers

Laura J. Graham

11/07/2019

Source: vignettes/flickr_plos_wordcloud.Rmd
flickr_plos_wordcloud.Rmd

Flickr papers

plos <- rplos::searchplos(q='flickr', 
                          fl=c('id','publication_date','subject', 'subject_level_1'),
                          limit = 200)$data %>% 
  
  mutate(keywords = map_chr(subject, get_kw),
         subjects = subject_level_1)

There are a total of 187 papers with the keyword flickr in the PLoS journals.

Keyword Wordcloud

kws <- plos %>% pull(keywords) %>% paste(collapse = ",") %>% str_split(",") %>% table %>% as.data.frame



wordcloud(words = kws$., freq = kws$Freq, min.freq = 1,
          max.words=200, random.order=FALSE, rot.per=0.35, 
          colors=brewer.pal(8, "Dark2"))

Subject frequency

plos %>% pull(subjects) %>% paste(collapse = ",") %>% str_split(",") %>% table %>% as.data.frame
##                                     . Freq
## 1           Biology and life sciences  155
## 2   Computer and information sciences  117
## 3                      Earth sciences   50
## 4  Ecology and environmental sciences   37
## 5          Engineering and technology   51
## 6        Medicine and health sciences   63
## 7                   People and places   49
## 8                   Physical sciences   82
## 9       Research and analysis methods  104
## 10                     Science policy   18
## 11                    Social sciences  140
